speaker: Doctor
text: Good morning, Mr. Smith. How have you been feeling since we added atorvastatin to your regimen?

speaker: Patient
text: Morning, Doctor. I've been feeling okay, but I've noticed some muscle aches lately. Could it be the new medication?

speaker: Doctor
text: Muscle aches can be a side effect of atorvastatin. How severe are the aches, and do they affect your daily activities?

speaker: Patient
text: They're not too severe, but they are noticeable, especially when I'm walking for a while.

speaker: Doctor
text: I see. We could try reducing the dose to see if that helps with the aches. Would you be comfortable with that approach?

speaker: Patient
text: Yes, I think that would be a good idea. I want to manage my cholesterol, but not at the cost of being in pain.
